entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain beginning this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 8 May 2023
